item.title: AUGUST 2020 Webinar Monthly Meeting ARCHIVE
item.dc:creator: don
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][dfd_heading subtitle="" enable_delimiter="" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h1|line_height:20" subtitle_font_options="tag:h5|color:%2333d187|line_height:50" title_responsive="line_height_desktop:25|line_height_tablet:30|line_height_mobile:55"]Saturday, August 22, 2020[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_heading subtitle="" enable_delimiter="" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:div|font_size:18|color:%2333d187|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:h5|line_height:50"]Due to the COVID-19 (coronavirus) outbreak, this chapter meeting will be held remotely. Please note: spots may be limited in the webinar.[/dfd_heading][dfd_heading subtitle="" enable_delimiter="" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:div|font_size:18|color:%2333d187|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:h5|color:%23dd3333|line_height:50|font_style_bold:1"]

THIS IS AN ARCHIVE OF A WEBINAR PRESENTED ON THE DATE ABOVE

[/dfd_heading][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_separator color="blue"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/6"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1595285392073{background-color: #b5ffb6 !important;}"]

If you have not already made a contribution for this program,Â 

please consider making a voluntary $5 or $10 donation to

AAII's LA Chapter. To donate online (CLICK HERE) Thank you!

[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h4|color:%23000000" subtitle_font_options="tag:h4"]

Elections and Disease Confronting Year-End, and Why 2019 Hated 2020

[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]In this talk Ken will display the what and why of several semi-predictable outcomes of American elections, why most market seers must always be wrong, and have been this year and will continue to do so. Then, he will delve into the most basic market lesson to learn from the COVID-19 experience that you can apply broadly to other market phenomena, and why the 2020's weak 1st half, tied to 2019, tells you nothing about it's back half. Ken will further delve into more specific views about how he sees markets for the back half of 2020 and into 2021 focusing on tools he has long utilized including the Pessimism of Disbelief and Confirmation Bias.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]
You will learn...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20the%202020%20bear%20and%20new%20bull%20market%20is%20the%20same%20and%20different%20than%20prior%20ones%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20to%20know%20what%20to%20expect%20in%20markets%20from%20the%20November%20election%20regardless%20of%20who%20wins%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20to%20understand%20why%2C%20what%20so%20many%20viewed%20as%20the%20stock%20market%20irrationally%20disconnected%20from%20a%20disastrous%20economy%20is%20not%20only%20rational%20but%20the%20way%20markets%20are%20supposed%20to%20work%5Cn%22%7D%5D" icon_border="border_style:none|border_color:%2334d288" main_style="style-1" icon_size="20" icon_color="#5e67bb" font_options="tag:h6|color:%2334d288"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]Ken Fisher is the founder, executive chairman and co-chief investment officer of Fisher Investments, a $115 billion money management company serving 73,000 clients worldwide. By most standards it is the world's largest Investment Advisor operating under the Investment Advisors Act of 1940. He penned the Forbes "Portfolio Strategy" column for 32 1/2 years, making him the longest-running columnist in Forbes' history. With eleven books, (and four New York Times bestsellers) under his belt, Fisher now writes regular monthly columns for major news organizations in 12 Western European and Asian nations, more than any columnist of any type in history. He is a prize-winning researcher of a dozen scholarly articles and holder of a Fabozzi/Jacobs Levy Award; his 1970's theoretical research led to the price-to-sales ratio, now a standard part of the financial curriculum. Fisher is ranked #195 on the 2019 Forbes 400 list of richest Americans.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_button button_text="PRESENTER'S WEBINAR RECORDING" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]Harnessing the Power of ThinkorSwim[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]ThinkorSwim is the trading platform used by customers at TD Ameritrade. I will be providing a tour of ThinkorSwim to show investors how ThinkorSwim can enhance investor decision making with regards to buying or selling stocks, options, and ETFs. We will explore the numerous capabilities that ThinkorSwim can provide investors in terms of making customized charts, watchlists, navigation, and how to properly place trades.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]
You will learn...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20investors%20can%20use%20ThinkorSwim%20to%20enhance%20their%20decision%20making%20and%20trading%20when%20selecting%20stocks%2C%20options%2C%20or%20ETFs%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22How%20to%20use%20the%20various%20features%20of%20ThinkorSwim%2C%20such%20as%20charts%2C%20watchlists%2C%20and%20how%20to%20place%20trades%22%7D%5D" icon_border="border_style:none|border_color:%2334d288" main_style="style-1" icon_size="20" icon_color="#5e67bb" font_options="tag:h6|color:%2334d288"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]Chicago-based Active Trader Business Development Team member delivering consultations on TD Ameritrade's trading platforms with over 17 years experience. Throughout my career I have focused on delivering critical information and education to traders of varying skill levels, in order to make educated decisions.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1598581604791{background-color: #eded55 !important;}"]

subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]Leverage the Power of AI for Smarter Strategy and Algorithmic Trading[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]Observe the Trade Ideas platform in action and see it's AI (artificial intelligence) features. Learn how Artificially Intelligent (AI) strategy can give you the power of performance without the demand for your time and energy![/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]
You will learn...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" list_fields="%5B%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20the%20power%20of%20algorithmic%20trading%20to%20minimize%20human%20error%20and%20maximize%20edge%20capture%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Learn%20how%20strategies%20are%20continually%20optimized%20to%20perform%20best%20in%20current%20market%20environments%22%7D%2C%7B%22icon_type%22%3A%22selector%22%2C%22select_icon%22%3A%22dfd_icons%22%2C%22ic_dfd_icons%22%3A%22dfd-socicon-arrow-pointing-to-right%22%2C%22text_content%22%3A%22Observe%20the%20Trade%20Ideas%20platform%20and%20see%20its%20AI%20(artificial%20intelligence)%5Cnin%20action%22%7D%5D" icon_border="border_style:none|border_color:%2334d288" main_style="style-1" icon_size="20" icon_color="#5e67bb" font_options="tag:h6|color:%2334d288"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]Sean McLaughlin currently serves as Chief Options Strategist for AllStarCharts.com and the Senior Market Strategist for Trade-Ideas, LLC. He is a Former Member of the Chicago Board of Trade. He has traded on proprietary trading desks, managed a small hedge fund, and continues to trade his own money, since 1998. Sean also served as the Directory of Community at StockTwits for 7 years. He lives near Boulder, CO. When not trading, he can usually be found hiking on a mountain trail.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_button button_text="PRESENTER'S WEBINAR RECORDING" tooltip_alignment="dfd-button-tooltip-bottom" main_style="style-2" buttom_link_src="url:https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2F4GCKFrKIAKE||target:%20_blank|" undefined="" text_color="#ffffff" ic_color="#ffffff" background="#38af36" box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" hover_box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color="blue"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
